fields.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
fields.review: The movie was the fourth film of the Thor franchise. Compared to previous Thor movies, this movie contains a lot of humour which may have thrown away Thor's image of being a serious character. Overall, the movie was good.

fields.title: Everything Everywhre All At Once
fields.review: The movie was quite unique. It has an interesting storyline which brings the audience for a ride. All of the emotions were felt when watching this moview which makes this a great movie.

fields.title: Topgun: Maverick
fields.review: Topgun: Maverick is a sequel to the Topgun movie in 1986. It follows Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell who needs to train a group of Topgun pilots to do a dangerous mission. The film keeps you at the edge of your seat as it contains a lot of tense moments in the jet fighting scenes.

fields.title: Avengers: Endgame
fields.review: The movie was a conclusion of Marvel's 10 year build up with movies on the characters. It the fourth film of the Avengers film franchise which continued directly from the third film. The movie was great as it puts all of the stories well and doesn't make any character left out.

fields.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
fields.review: Minios: The Rise of Gru tells the story of the minions from the Despicable Me franchise. It shows how the minions follow Gru (the main character) who dreams to become a supervillain. the film contains a lot of comedy and is family friendly, which makes it a great movie

fields.title: Incantation
fields.review: This film follows the genre of found footage and horror. The way that this film is shot really makes the viewers feel that they are in the movie. THe POV style shoot really emphasizes the situation and the creepines of the film.

fields.title: The Sea Beast
fields.review: The movie tells the story of a young orphan firl who joins a group of sea monster hunters on their search for the elusive Red Bluster.

fields.title: The Gray Man
fields.review: The movie is produced by the Russo brothers company. It focues on the CIA Agent “Sierra Six”, who is on the run from sociopathic ex-CIA Agent and mercenary Lloyd Hansen upon discovering corrupt secrets about his superior.

fields.title: Love, Rosie
fields.review: The movie tells the story of Rosie and Alex. Rosie and Alex have been friends since childhood and cannot imagine themselves as a couple. However, when they head in different directions, they realise that they are made for each other. It makes the viewers feel different kinds of emotions with the plot

fields.title: The Adam Project
fields.review: The Adam Project is about a pilot who travels back in time and encounters his younger self whom he has to work together to defeat an enemy. The story itself is quite intersting as it contains time travel and it is fun seeing the main character (Ryan Reynolds) interact with his younger self (Walker Sobell)
